Headline: Loop-bound Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Southport. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Brown Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Southport.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
